name: Catapult, cat space program
description:
Cat goes on a mission for the moon.

Hope you enjoy!

Controls:

  • Click buttons to select them
  • Click & hold left mouse to drag cat. Then drag to catapult & release.
  • Click & hold left mouse to create trampolines.
